words.source: H6327 wayyiqtol 3ms Niphal of פּוּץ 'to scatter, disperse'; KJV 'were scattered', ESV 'were scattered', NASB 'were scattered'
H5971 def. art. + n.ms עַם 'people'; all trans. agree
H3605 prep. b- + n.ms כֹּל 'all, every'; KJV 'throughout all', ESV 'throughout all', NASB 'through all'
H776 n.fs construct אֶרֶץ 'land, earth'; KJV 'the land of', ESV 'the land of', NASB 'the land of'
H4714 proper name; all trans. agree
H7197 prep. l- + Polel inf. constr. of קָשַׁשׁ 'to gather stubble'; KJV 'to gather', ESV 'to gather', NASB 'to gather'
H7179 n.ms קַשׁ 'stubble, chaff'; KJV 'stubble', ESV 'stubble', NASB 'stubble'
H8401 prep. l- + def. art. + n.ms תֶּבֶן 'straw'; KJV 'instead of straw', ESV 'for straw', NASB 'to use as straw'
